Posts.Content: Cinnie wrote: I was diagnosed with encapsulated papillary carcinoma on 10-11-16. Found on my annual mammogram followed by ultra sound and biopsy. Oncologist says it is 1cm and says chemo is off the table. Having lumpectomy with SNB done on 11-16-16. Have had mammon every year and they have always been negative so I'm hoping that all will be ok. Also had MRI done yesterday but not sure what this is supposed to show. Just praying that all will be ok. Thank you for allowing me to talk about this Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Encapsulated papillary carcinoma Cinnie obsolete

Posts.Content: Nov 11, 2016 03:14PM Cinnie wrote: Thank you for a forum where issues like this can be discussed! I trust our Lord to see me through this and I am very confident but of course also a little apprehensive. Will check in after my surgery
